text: Delivery window was 2-6 PM. Courier arrived at 9 AM when nobody home. Now rescheduled for next Wednesday.
I apologize for missed delivery window. I'll request specific time slot with dispatch and send courier tracking updates to your phone.
FedEx tracking shows 'delivered to front desk' but building concierge has no record. Package weight was 22 lbs.
That violates signature protocol. I'm filing carrier violation report and updating your delivery preferences for future shipments.
Package contents shifted during transit. Heard items broken inside box. External damage visible - corners crushed, tape torn.
I'll approve immediate damaged shipment claim. Replacement parcel will dispatch overnight via Amazon Logistics with priority freight handling.
Signature required delivery but driver just left package at mailroom without any signature. Security risk for valuable shipment.
